codex.beemancer.bee.introduction.title: Introduction to Beemancy
codex.beemancer.bee.introduction.desc: Begin your journey as a Beemancer
codex.beemancer.bee.first_bee.title: Your First Bee
codex.beemancer.bee.first_bee.desc: Capture and nurture your first magic bee
codex.beemancer.bee.magic_hive.title: Magic Hive
codex.beemancer.bee.magic_hive.desc: Build a home for your magical bees
codex.beemancer.bee.breeding.title: Bee Breeding
codex.beemancer.bee.breeding.desc: Combine genes to create new bee species
codex.beemancer.bee.gene_mastery.title: Gene Mastery
codex.beemancer.bee.gene_mastery.desc: Master the art of genetic manipulation
codex.beemancer.alchemy.alchemy_basics.d: Learn the fundamentals of bee alchemy
codex.beemancer.alchemy.honey_extraction: Extract magical honey from your bees
codex.beemancer.alchemy.bee_products.des: Discover the products of bee alchemy

message.beemancer.essence_extractor.inva: Invalid structure - check the extractor pattern
codex.beemancer.bees.meadow_bee.title: Meadow Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.meadow_bee.desc: A peaceful bee found in flower-filled meadows, producing sweet honeycomb.
codex.beemancer.bees.forest_bee.title: Forest Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.forest_bee.desc: Thrives among the trees, gathering pollen from woodland flowers.
codex.beemancer.bees.rocky_bee.title: Rocky Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.rocky_bee.desc: A hardy bee that feeds on crystals, leaving behind cobblestone in its wake.
codex.beemancer.bees.river_bee.title: River Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.river_bee.desc: Lives near flowing water, its honey has a refreshing quality.
codex.beemancer.bees.dune_bee.title: Dune Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.dune_bee.desc: An aggressive desert dweller that collects sand grains in its combs.
codex.beemancer.bees.nether_bee.title: Nether Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.nether_bee.desc: Born in hellfire, this aggressive bee has adapted to extreme heat.
codex.beemancer.bees.end_bee.title: End Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.end_bee.desc: A mysterious bee from the void, touched by ender energy.
codex.beemancer.bees.monsty_bee.title: Monsty Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.monsty_bee.desc: A mischievous bee with a taste for monsters.
codex.beemancer.bees.docile_bee.title: Docile Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.docile_bee.desc: The gentlest of bees, never harms a living soul.
codex.beemancer.bees.loam_bee.title: Loam Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.loam_bee.desc: Burrows in rich soil, producing dirt-infused combs.
codex.beemancer.bees.sediment_bee.title: Sediment Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.sediment_bee.desc: Sifts through riverbeds, collecting gravel particles.
codex.beemancer.bees.spark_bee.title: Spark Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.spark_bee.desc: Creates tiny sparks as it flies, leaving flint in its comb.
codex.beemancer.bees.cultural_bee.title: Cultural Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.cultural_bee.desc: A civilized bee that learned from watching farmers.
codex.beemancer.bees.carbon_bee.title: Carbon Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.carbon_bee.desc: Nocturnal bee that gathers coal fragments in darkness.
codex.beemancer.bees.cupric_bee.title: Cupric Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.cupric_bee.desc: Attracted to oxidized metals, produces raw copper shards.
codex.beemancer.bees.festering_bee.title: Festering Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.festering_bee.desc: Feeds on decay, leaving rotten flesh in its comb.
codex.beemancer.bees.skeletal_bee.title: Skeletal Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.skeletal_bee.desc: A ghastly bee that collects bones from fallen creatures.
codex.beemancer.bees.silken_bee.title: Silken Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.silken_bee.desc: Spins silk-like threads into its honeycomb.
codex.beemancer.bees.arachnid_bee.title: Arachnid Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.arachnid_bee.desc: Eight-legged hybrid that produces spider eyes.
codex.beemancer.bees.tanner_bee.title: Tanner Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.tanner_bee.desc: Its enzymes can process hide into leather fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.plume_bee.title: Plume Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.plume_bee.desc: A swift and light bee that sheds feathers as it flies.
codex.beemancer.bees.quercus_bee.title: Quercus Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.quercus_bee.desc: Nests in mighty oaks, producing oak log fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.boreal_bee.title: Boreal Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.boreal_bee.desc: Thrives in cold forests, collecting spruce essence.
codex.beemancer.bees.tropical_bee.title: Tropical Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.tropical_bee.desc: Dwells in humid jungles, gathering jungle wood.
codex.beemancer.bees.paperbark_bee.title: Paperbark Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.paperbark_bee.desc: Loves birch trees, creating pale wood fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.reed_bee.title: Reed Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.reed_bee.desc: Lives among sugar cane, sweetening its honey further.
codex.beemancer.bees.karot_bee.title: Karot Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.tuber_bee.title: Tuber Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.tuber_bee.desc: Burrows underground to tend potato crops.
codex.beemancer.bees.juicy_bee.title: Juicy Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.juicy_bee.desc: Produces refreshing melon slices in its comb.
codex.beemancer.bees.gourd_bee.title: Gourd Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.gourd_bee.desc: A festive bee that grows miniature pumpkins.
codex.beemancer.bees.agrarian_bee.title: Agrarian Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.agrarian_bee.desc: The farmer's friend, cultivating wheat with care.
codex.beemancer.bees.prince_bee.title: Prince Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.prince_bee.desc: A noble bee of royal lineage, spawned naturally.
codex.beemancer.bees.flower_bee.title: Flower Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.flower_bee.desc: Pollinates all flowers, carrying precious flower pollen.
codex.beemancer.bees.mushroom_bee.title: Mushroom Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.mushroom_bee.desc: Thrives in darkness, spreading mushroom spores.
codex.beemancer.bees.tree_bee.title: Tree Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.tree_bee.desc: Master of all forests, collecting tree pollen.
codex.beemancer.bees.crystal_bee.title: Crystal Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.crystal_bee.desc: Crystallizes honey into magical crystal pollen.
codex.beemancer.bees.argil_bee.title: Argil Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.argil_bee.desc: Shapes clay balls with remarkable precision.
codex.beemancer.bees.umbra_bee.title: Umbra Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.umbra_bee.desc: Dwells in shadowy groves of dark oak.
codex.beemancer.bees.savanna_bee.title: Savanna Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.savanna_bee.desc: Roams dry grasslands, collecting acacia wood.
codex.beemancer.bees.frost_bee.title: Frost Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.frost_bee.desc: A cold-loving bee that freezes water into ice fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.volatile_bee.title: Volatile Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.volatile_bee.desc: Handle with care! Produces gunpowder fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.ashen_bee.title: Ashen Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.ashen_bee.desc: Born from volcanic ash, leaving andesite in its wake.
codex.beemancer.bees.igneous_bee.title: Igneous Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.igneous_bee.desc: Forged in magma chambers, producing diorite.
codex.beemancer.bees.rose_stone_bee.desc: Attracted to pink minerals, creating granite.
codex.beemancer.bees.infernalist_bee.des: A demonic bee spawned in the depths of the Nether.
codex.beemancer.bees.swift_bee.title: Swift Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.swift_bee.desc: Incredibly fast, a blur of golden wings.
codex.beemancer.bees.royal_bee.title: Royal Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.royal_bee.desc: Produces the coveted Royal Comb, fit for a queen.
codex.beemancer.bees.ferrous_bee.title: Ferrous Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.ferrous_bee.desc: Magnetized to iron, producing raw iron shards.
codex.beemancer.bees.flux_bee.title: Flux Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.flux_bee.desc: Channels energy through its body, dropping redstone dust.
codex.beemancer.bees.lazuli_bee.title: Lazuli Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.lazuli_bee.desc: Deep blue in color, producing lapis lazuli fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.quartzose_bee.title: Quartzose Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.quartzose_bee.desc: Thrives in Nether heat, creating quartz fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.luminous_bee.title: Luminous Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.luminous_bee.desc: Glows brightly in darkness, shedding glowstone dust.
codex.beemancer.bees.grim_bee.title: Grim Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.grim_bee.desc: A dark bee from the basalt deltas, producing blackstone.
codex.beemancer.bees.columnar_bee.title: Columnar Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.columnar_bee.desc: Builds towering structures from basalt columns.
codex.beemancer.bees.viscous_bee.title: Viscous Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.inky_bee.title: Inky Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.inky_bee.desc: Leaves trails of ink wherever it goes.
codex.beemancer.bees.fleece_bee.title: Fleece Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.fleece_bee.desc: Soft and fluffy, producing wool from pollen.
codex.beemancer.bees.adobe_bee.title: Adobe Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.adobe_bee.desc: Bakes clay under the desert sun into terracotta.
codex.beemancer.bees.geode_bee.title: Geode Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.geode_bee.desc: Grows beautiful amethyst shards in its hive.
codex.beemancer.bees.marsh_bee.title: Marsh Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.marsh_bee.desc: Navigates murky swamps, gathering mangrove wood.
codex.beemancer.bees.majestic_bee.title: Majestic Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.majestic_bee.desc: The pride of any apiary, radiating regal beauty.
codex.beemancer.bees.steady_bee.title: Steady Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.steady_bee.desc: Unwavering and reliable, immune to most threats.
codex.beemancer.bees.wind_bee.title: Wind Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.wind_bee.desc: Commands the winds, carrying Pollen of Wind.
codex.beemancer.bees.thunder_bee.title: Thunder Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.thunder_bee.desc: Crackles with electricity, bearing Pollen of Thunder.
codex.beemancer.bees.water_bee.title: Water Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.water_bee.desc: Master of aquatic realms, carrying Pollen of Water.
codex.beemancer.bees.fire_bee.title: Fire Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.fire_bee.desc: Burns with inner flame, bearing Pollen of Fire.
codex.beemancer.bees.auric_bee.title: Auric Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.auric_bee.desc: Golden-winged treasure hunter, producing raw gold fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.magmatic_bee.title: Magmatic Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.magmatic_bee.desc: Swims through lava, creating magma cream shards.
codex.beemancer.bees.spirit_bee.title: Spirit Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.spirit_bee.desc: A ghostly bee that haunts soul sand valleys.
codex.beemancer.bees.crimson_bee.title: Crimson Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.crimson_bee.desc: Cultivates nether wart in crimson forests.
codex.beemancer.bees.mycelial_bee.title: Mycelial Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.mycelial_bee.desc: Spreads fungal mycelium wherever it lands.
codex.beemancer.bees.humus_bee.title: Humus Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.humus_bee.desc: Enriches soil into podzol with its activities.
codex.beemancer.bees.floral_bee.title: Floral Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.floral_bee.desc: A royal gardener that spreads flowers everywhere.
codex.beemancer.bees.treasure_bee.title: Treasure Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.siphoning_bee.title: Siphoning Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.siphoning_bee.desc: Drains energy from the End dimension.
codex.beemancer.bees.zephyr_bee.title: Zephyr Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.zephyr_bee.desc: The fastest bee ever recorded, a mere blur.
codex.beemancer.bees.prismatic_bee.title: Prismatic Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.crystalline_bee.des: Creates prismarine crystals of perfect clarity.
codex.beemancer.bees.insomnia_bee.title: Insomnia Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.blazing_bee.title: Blazing Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.blazing_bee.desc: Burns with infernal fury, producing blaze rod fragments.
codex.beemancer.bees.diamantine_bee.desc: The ultimate gem collector, producing diamond dust.
codex.beemancer.bees.venerable_bee.title: Venerable Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.venerable_bee.desc: Ancient and wise, creating precious emerald dust.
codex.beemancer.bees.volcanic_bee.title: Volcanic Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.volcanic_bee.desc: Born in eruptions, producing obsidian dust.
codex.beemancer.bees.xenolith_bee.title: Xenolith Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.xenolith_bee.desc: Stranger from beyond, leaving end stone behind.
codex.beemancer.bees.traveler_bee.title: Traveler Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.traveler_bee.desc: Teleports short distances, shedding ender pearl dust.
codex.beemancer.bees.sorrow_bee.title: Sorrow Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.sorrow_bee.desc: Cries tears that crystallize into ghast tear shards.
codex.beemancer.bees.absorbent_bee.title: Absorbent Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.absorbent_bee.desc: Soaks up water, creating sponge material.
codex.beemancer.bees.light_bee.title: Light Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.light_bee.desc: Radiates pure light, carrying Pollen of Light.
codex.beemancer.bees.dark_bee.title: Dark Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.dark_bee.desc: Absorbs all light, bearing Pollen of Darkness.
codex.beemancer.bees.imperial_bee.title: Imperial Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.imperial_bee.desc: Rules over all other bees with absolute authority.
codex.beemancer.bees.demonic_bee.title: Demonic Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.demonic_bee.desc: A terrifying bee corrupted by dark forces.
codex.beemancer.bees.paladin_bee.title: Paladin Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.paladin_bee.desc: A holy warrior bee that smites hostile creatures.
codex.beemancer.bees.chorus_bee.title: Chorus Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.ancient_bee.title: Ancient Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.ancient_bee.desc: Primordial bee that produces netherite scrap dust.
codex.beemancer.bees.void_bee.title: Void Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.void_bee.desc: Exists between light and dark, carrying Void Pollen.
codex.beemancer.bees.draconic_bee.title: Draconic Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.draconic_bee.desc: Infused with dragon essence, producing dragon breath dust.
codex.beemancer.bees.stellar_bee.title: Stellar Bee
codex.beemancer.bees.stellar_bee.desc: Born from a dying star, shedding nether star dust.
